description: The underwater research facility was once a hub of scientific discovery and innovation. However, after a catastrophic accident that left the facility on the brink of collapse, it was abandoned and left to decay. The once-state-of-the-art equipment now lies in disarray, and the eerie silence is only broken by the creaking of twisted metal and the faint whispers of the past.

rooms.name: Reception Area
rooms.description: A small, dimly lit reception area with a worn-out couch and a single, flickering light bulb. A large wooden counter stands opposite the entrance, with several broken computer terminals and a shattered glass window.
rooms.passages: The only passage out of this room leads to Room 2.

items.name: Lost Logbook
items.description: A torn and dog-eared logbook belonging to one of the facility's researchers. The pages are filled with cryptic notes and diagrams, but a few entries seem to hint at a desperate attempt to warn others about an impending disaster.

rooms.name: Lab Area
rooms.description: A large laboratory filled with rows of workstations and various scientific equipment. The walls are lined with shelves containing dusty jars, beakers, and other forgotten supplies.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 1 leads to a door that now hangs off its hinges. To the left is a dark corridor leading deeper into the facility (Room 3).

items.name: Disused Microscope
items.description: A broken microscope with a cracked lens and loose screws. It looks like it hasn't been used in years.

items.name: Faded Diagrams
items.description: Several faded diagrams on the walls, depicting various scientific experiments and theories. One of them seems to be a crude illustration of an underwater vortex.

rooms.name: Dark Corridor
rooms.description: A narrow, dimly lit corridor with cold concrete walls and flickering fluorescent lights. The air is thick with the smell of decay and neglect.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 2 leads to a door that appears to be locked (Room 4). To the right is another dark corridor leading deeper into the facility (Room 5).

items.name: Waterlogged Toolbox
items.description: A rusty toolbox half-submerged in water, with tools and equipment scattered all over the floor.

rooms.name: Locked Storage Room
rooms.description: A small storage room with several locked cabinets and a large safe in the center of the room. The air is stale, and the smell of mold permeates everything.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 3 appears to be blocked (locked door). To the left is another dark corridor leading back towards the entrance (Room 1).

items.name: Keycard Reader
items.description: A damaged keycard reader that lies on the floor, with a few tangled wires and cables surrounding it.

rooms.name: Deeper Corridor
rooms.description: A longer, darker corridor that stretches further into the facility. The walls are lined with pipes and electrical conduits, and the air is thick with dust.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 3 leads to a door that appears to be slightly ajar (Room 6). To the left is another dark corridor leading back towards Room 2.

items.name: Water-Stained Map
items.description: A torn and water-stained map of the facility's layout, with several annotations and scribbles on it.

rooms.name: Central Control Room
rooms.description: A large control room with several computer terminals and a central console. The walls are lined with screens displaying cryptic messages and system alerts.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 5 leads to a door that appears to be locked (Room 7). To the right is another dark corridor leading towards Room 3.

items.name: Central Computer
items.description: A central computer system with several screens displaying various data and graphs. One of the screens seems to be showing a countdown timer.

rooms.name: Abandoned Office
rooms.description: A small office with several desks and chairs scattered around. The walls are lined with old files and papers, and the air is thick with dust.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 6 appears to be blocked (locked door). To the left is another dark corridor leading back towards Room 5.

items.name: Old Office Supplies
items.description: A box of old office supplies, including pens, paper clips, and staples.

rooms.name: Submerged Laboratory
rooms.description: A laboratory that appears to be submerged underwater. The walls are lined with equipment and experiments, but everything is covered in water and sediment.
rooms.passages: The passage from Room 7 leads to a door that appears to be locked (Room 9). To the right is another dark corridor leading back towards Room 6.

items.name: Waterlogged Equipment
items.description: A collection of waterlogged equipment, including microscopes, pipettes, and other scientific tools.

rooms.name: Underwater Vortex Room
rooms.description: A room that appears to be located at the center of an underwater vortex. The walls are lined with equipment and experiments, but everything is distorted and swirling around.

rooms.name: Final Warning
rooms.description: A small room with a single console displaying a countdown timer and several warnings about an impending disaster.

items.name: Final Message
items.description: A final message from the scientists, detailing their attempts to warn others about the impending disaster.
